content: i made up this pattern to make a batch of ornaments to attach to my christmas cards this year i had so much fun with it i made 25 stars in two days this is a super-easy super-quick 5-round pattern good for beginners and i know because i am one and for advanced crocheters looking for a tv-watching pattern i think these stars would also be cute decorating garlands and packages and at the right gauge they might make great earrings or maybe even pasties oh -- i should also say that these little stars use just a small amount of yarn i made all those 25 stars from my one skein of malabrigo so this would be a great project for your scraps
